thread.title: Kamran Akmal all set to make a comeback
thread.title_full: Kamran Akmal all set to make a comeback

title: Kamran Akmal all set to make a comeback
text:
Kamran Akmal all set to make a comeback | 0 0 
Kamran Akmal turned out to be the best batsman and wicket keeper   season II with his outstanding 353 runs and 12 catches behind stumps. 
Kamran is now all set to make his way back to the national team. If this happens, wicket keeper batsman Mohammad Rizwan will have to leave his place to make room for Akmal. It's also a fact that the experienced wicket keeper batsman Kamran Akmal is not going to be the first choice for wicket keeping, reason being the presence of Sarfaraz Ahmad in the squad. 
On the other hand, reports claim that coach Mickey Arthur has reservations over Kamran's selection as a fielder/batsman. He is also of the view that inclusion of Akmal at the age of 35 may go against future plans. 0 0 Kamran Akmal all set to make a comeback was posted in sports of Geo TV - https://www.geo.tv on March 08, 2017 and was last updated on March 08, 2017. This news story is related to Latest Sports News, Sports News, Geo News, Cricket News, Cricket, Kamran Akmal, Psl.
